item.title: Moving time indicator in composition timeline in After Effects CS6 using scripts
item.description: So, Javascript code for position changing is simple. Lets say comp - is your composition: precomp = app.project.items.addComp( "ololo", width, height, 1.0, duration, frameRate);move pointer to time 0.2: comp.time = 0.2;

item.title: How to open composition in viewer in Adobe After Effects using scripts
